name: ExhalingHope
0:
”Alexa, open Exhaling Hope”
”Alexa, start Exhaling Hope”
”Alexa, launch Exhaling Hope”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: exhaling hope
des:
Ask for Exhaling Hope and listen to excerpts from the book written by Jean Mello, his first publication translated into English. The book addresses reflective themes in each tale or chronicle. 

The skill Exhaling Hope brings some notions of the thoughts shared in the book. A good panorama to start later the reading of Exhaling Hope, which can be purchased in the Kindle Store.

To start, just say "Alexa, start Exhaling Hope" or "Alexa, open Exhaling Hope", to receive as an answer a striking excerpt from the book.

At any time, you can say "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
